Player History
Drafted in 21st round, 328th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off David Gerrish (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/8/2015, off Erik Boyce (SEA)...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Injured on 9/15/2017 with a Spasms Back, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 5/10/2018 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2018...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/5/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $1,500,750 per year...
Injured on 4/4/2019 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Released by Cincinnati on 8/14/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/15/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
